title: What Bird Is That?
content:
As someone who is interested in birds but doesnâ€™t know a whole lot about them, this new animated video series from Will Rose is right up my alley. What Bird Is That? is a beginners guide to birding. The second episode, embedded above, is all about how to identify birds from their calls.

Whatâ€™s that bird that sounds like Star Wars singing on my roof? What bird sings itâ€™s own name? Whatâ€™s that laughing sound you heard in the woods?

Right now, I â€œcheatâ€ by using Cornell Lab of Ornithologyâ€™s eBird app, which allows you to record a bit of birdsong and itâ€™ll ID the bird for you. (via the kid should see this)
